net.sf.javaml.featureselection
Interface FeatureRanking

All Superinterfaces:
FeatureSelection
All Known Implementing Classes:
LinearRankingEnsemble, RankingFromScoring, RecursiveFeatureEliminationSVM, WekaAttributeSelection
public interface FeatureRanking
extends FeatureSelection

Interface for algorithms that can generate an attribute ranking. Higher values in the ranking means that the attribute is less informative or is worth less.

Version:
%SVN.VERSION%
Author:
Thomas Abeel (thomas@abeel.be)

Method Summary
 int rank(int attIndex)
          Get the ranking of the given attribute.
 
Methods inherited from interface net.sf.javaml.featureselection.FeatureSelection
build, noAttributes
 

Method Detail

rank

int rank(int attIndex)
Get the ranking of the given attribute. The first rank is 0 and is the best. The higher the rank, the worse the attribute.

Parameters:
attIndex - the index of the attribute to rank
Returns:
the rank of the attribute
